segments.text: What did you think of the movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't like it . Not a bit . I couldn't stand the music . Besides the story was so boring that it put me to sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I noticed that , it was not exciting as I expected , but the music was great . I'm always found Jazz . And that movie had a lot of Jazz .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . However , Jazz always annoys me . I really don't enjoy music in a movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that.What kind of movie do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything with a lot of action , I like thrillers and chillers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I enjoy the popcorn and being with you.You ' re more important than the movie .
segments.speaker: S2
